author: {'steamid': '76561198025273709', 'num_games_owned': 575, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1711575882}
review:
I don't remember when I got this one, was years ago. Don't look at my playtime, it was probably to farm for steamcards.
This game isn't any good. The gameplay is mindless shooting, the graphics are extremely busy and ugly I can't tell the enemy bullets from the explosion particles and the pixel diarrhea that is going on,  the sound effects are very basic and broken, (if two same sounds play at the same time, they will play at double the volume and clip). Overall not polished at all. Like I would expect this quality from a 2 day game jam. Not a 5€ steam release. Why did I play this? I was browsing my steam library and decided to play this on a whim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1538580047}
review:
Tags: Sidescroll Shooter
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Missing SFX. Poor quality sprites. Barebone animation. Spam oriented encounter design. Auto-firing foes. Less refined than NES Mario.

There are a lot of quality sidescroll shooters with a cartoon military dressing on it. Gunslugs just botches too much to really get in that bracket. The game feels phoned in with linear boring level design, lots of drops that negate any sense of consequence. Bullets that break crates but often the bullet sprite goes through them. Stiff jump animation. The list goes on. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/274190/Broforce/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/366250/METAL_SLUG/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/250700/Super_Time_Force_Ultra/

author: {'steamid': '76561198038056805', 'num_games_owned': 3183, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1525445517}
review:
A short, yet fun take on what would happen if you mixed Contra with Jetpack Joyride. Very fun experience. My only complaint are that some achievements seem bugged (get x number of coins/kills).

Otherwise, it's a fun, simple time killer that would have been better on mobile, but works great on PC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198313432047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1590082459}
review:
无脑的爽快游戏，带有轻微肉鸽来客元素，人物可解锁、有多种枪械。音效爆炸让人沉浸再杀戮当中。不过就是有点过于无脑了，基本不会死。
+爽快的横版射击
+多人物，而且可以解锁
+多种枪械
-场景敌人有些单调
-有点无脑，关卡概念模糊
（3/5）一款不错的游戏，毕竟体积太小做不了大文章，但是作者是十分用心的。
一开始玩的时候还会担心弹药、血量之类的，但是事实上你基本就是死不了，捡的金币好像没什么太大的用处，就是杀杀杀的小游戏。不过第二部很丰富哦，可以看看。

author: {'steamid': '76561198798543965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1518681316}
review:
对于一个手残玩家来说，这类没有存档的游戏是很让人讨厌的，一不小心死掉就要从第一关重新开始。
不过手感蛮不错的，射击的感觉还不错，但是觉得游戏设计有点单调。

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1511240960}
review:
It's a pixel heavy ripoff of older, better arcade games like SNKs Metal Slug from 1996.  I'm not sure how it's possible to rip off a game from the 1990's in 2015 (almost 20 years later!) and come out with worse graphics, but Orangepixel somehow managed it.

Less content, worse graphics.   Gameplay is okay but gets repetitive almost immediately. 

Fans of the genre would be better off just playing Metal Slug on an emulator.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198078126278', 'num_games_owned': 9703, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1590117011}
review:
[b]Información Básica[/b]
[i]Título[/i]: [h1]Gunslugs[/h1]
[i]Estatus[/i]: Completo
[i]Desarrollador[/i]: Orangepixel
[i]Distribuidor[/i]: Orangepixel
[i]Genero[/i]: Plataformas, Acción
[i]Fecha de Lanzamiento[/i]: 2 de Junio del 2015
[i]Modos de Juego[/i]: Single-player, Co-Op a Pantalla compartida

[b]Impresiones Generales[/b]
Aunque Gunslugs fue uno de los primeros juegos que obtuve en Steam, no fue, si no hasta el año pasado que me decidí a jugarlo. Es de notar que el juego lo obtuve de manera gratuita en uno de esos múltiples random 'giveawayas' que se dan por doquier. El juego en si, es un plataformer retro, muy al estilo de juegos como Contra, pero mas sencillo. Como buen indie, es bastante ligero y corre sin problema en cualquier equipo, por lo que cualquiera puede jugarlo sin mucho problema.

Como ya había mencionado, el juego esta muy inspirado en Contra, la jugabilidad es prácticamente la misma: corre atravesando el nivel mientras esquivas balas y despachas a tus enemigos, y al final de la etapa te enfrentarás a un jefe gigante. La formula se repite a lo largo de sus cinco  niveles, solo cambiando el diseño de estos. Aún así, el juego es muy divertido, en momentos los enemigos te pueden abrumar, pero con un intercambio de balas todo se resuelve. Con una buena variedad de niveles y enemigos por abatir. tenemos diversión asegurada por algunas buenas horas.

Tenemos varios personajes para elegir, siendo en si todos similares hasta donde note... Los desbloqueamos muy a la usanza de BroForce (ir y rescatarlos, aunque están siempre en un lugar determinado).Una cosa que me gustó mucho, son los minijuegos y 'easter eggs' que tiene, los hay muy variados (por ejemplo esta el inspirado en Donkey Kong, o el de Doctor Who, y usualmente involucran desbloquear un logro o un power up (el del Doctor es un 'warp'). 

Otra cosa singular del juego, es la forma en que se desbloquean los logros. Y es que, a diferencia del método tradicional, debemos tenerlo en la lista de misiones activas que son solamente 3 y que se desbloquean una vez que se termina  el nivel. Esto implica por ejemplo, tener que terminar el juego si se tiene una misión para los primeros niveles mientras estamos en la fase final. 

El juego en si es una experiencia single player, pero igualmente nos blinda la posibilidad de jugar contra otra persona, dividiendo la pantalla en dos. Sinceramente no tuve con quien poder jugar en esta modalidad, así que evitaré comentarios al respecto.

He leído que en muchas reviews mas antiguas, se quejan de la imposibilidad de cambiar los blindeos que trae por defecto el juego. Al tiempo que lo jugué, esto ya ha sido corregido.

En general es un juego divertido, muy recomendado si te gustan juegos como contra o Broforce; mas aun si esta en oferta o en algún bundle. 


[b]Pros[/b]
+ Concepto divertido, un buen mata tiempos.
+ Gráficas pixeladas.
+ Logros y Cartas

[b]Contras[/b]
- Tiende a ser repetitivo.
- Algunas etapas pueden ser muy complicadas.
- El sistema de logros es algo confuso en un principio.

[b]Calificación[/b] [h1]3/10[/h1] Técnicamente no posee grandes virtudes, aunque en general no es mal juego.
[b]Factor Diversión[/b] [h1]3/5[/h1] Es un juego divertido para pasar el rato, mientras completas los logros te mantendrá entretenido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035826801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 643, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1482156539}
review: Awfully repetitive combat and a terrible UI control scheme. Game progress resets when you press B twice to go back to main menu. Z or X skips any secret level cutscenes (or the whole level itself, I'm not sure), leaving you to wonder what your gold coins were used for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198190228431', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1477678309}
review: Долго лежала эта игрушка у меня в библиотеке и вот решил запустить...Игрушка напомнила марио который в детстве очень любил,даже есть игры где собираешь монетки и убиваешь мобов прыжками,ну прям как в марио)музыкального сопровождения хоть не так уж и много,помоему три коппозиции,однако мне не налоели,ровно так же как и остальная озвучка,проигрывал и проходил уровни снова и снова,не заметил как вот уже почти девять часов пролетело за игрой)управление до  нельзя простое,стрелочки и мышка,экшена в этом платформере хватает,автор большой молодец,видно что делал с душой.Правда есть неприятный момент,иногда персонаж при нажатии на мышку и стреляет и прыгает,почему это возникает и как исправляется и исправляется ли вообще хотелось бы узнать...В общем от души понастольгировал,определённо запущу снова,постораюсь пройти полностью и открыть всех персонажей и локации

author: {'steamid': '76561198077817772', 'num_games_owned': 1626, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1471719189}
review:
a fun little 8bit style indie game that remind me of contra and metal slug ,you got simple objectives to complete (and they are achievements at the same time) nice B.O and everything works fine (no bugs or glitches )but the game is really hard and becomes unfair , it starts good and easy then it becomes hard and if you die you start from the beginning (no checkpoints) and that ruined toe game for me .
save your 5$ and buy something better then this game (gave it a thumb up cause i got it for free otherwise it would be a no from me ) 
5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197967580967', 'num_games_owned': 1866, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1470858534}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057334690', 'num_games_owned': 2528, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1465825624}

author: {'steamid': '76561198175507334', 'num_games_owned': 480, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1451546627}
review:
추천점수 10점중에 9점

꽤나 단순한 플레이로 중독성이 꽤 강하다.
게다가 캐릭터도 하다보면 자연스럽게 열려서 꽤 할만하다.

하지만 단점이 한가지 있다면
뒤로갈수록 너무 어렵고 안드로이드 게임을 이식해 판매하는것 같은 게임이라 아쉽긴했다,
다음세일엔 건슬러그2를 사서 해봐야겠다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135678631', 'num_games_owned': 6937, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1458271462}
review:
不错的射击游戏，就是不适合我，因为反应太慢。。。挂卡了
更新：发现原来是我的玩法有问题。。不一定要消灭所有敌人的，可以选择跳过去，这个游戏目的炸掉碉堡，不是杀人。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198082147294', 'num_games_owned': 1262, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1456156801}
review:
I really wanted to enjoy this game.
The game makes you pick up coins, ammo, and health packs (which are just small for you to notice), and you can buy power ups during the stages to help you. But every time you die, you go to the beginning of the game, however, rescuing new characters gives access to the stage you rescued them, but since the characters are mostly the same, the stages keep getting harder and you will not have enough coins to buy power ups, the logical answer is to replay old stages for help which is really annoying.
The controls are decent and, the sound is okay and there isn't much to say about the graphics.
However, these things are badly implemented. The sound is just there, the gameplay becomes confusing when you have so many enemies on screen at the same time, sure they look different, but that only makes it more difficult to identify yourself on the screen.
The game also lacks feedback on many places, you hardly notice when taking damage, picking a weapon gives only a small prompt on under your life bar that becomes really annoying when everything blends together.
Speaking of weapons, they aren't really great, sometimes I would find myself avoiding them because my standard gun is more straightforward even though the shots don't go too far.
Also the achievement system requires you to have a certain objective for it to count as an achievement.
The worst offender though is time. Yep, everything has a weird timing, mine quickly beep twice before exploding, enemies take too long to disappear after dying and only drop items after disappearing, and, though these items stay on the screen a good amount of time, just like the mines, they blip too fast for you to pick up before disappearing. Enemy choppers come too fast and you need to destroy them using the environment.
To me, all of these design decisions make the game too frustrating for it to be fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024246936', 'num_games_owned': 5024, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1450387865}
review: There are games that are tough because they provide a legitimate challenge, and then there are games like Gunslugs that wall the player by throwing as much cheap difficulty at them as possible. Had most of these people who gave the game positive reviews actually played it for more than a few minutes, they'd realize that this game is only playable for the first level. After that, it becomes nearly impossible because the player is continually confronted by impassable waves of procedurally-generated horse shit. As if that weren't enough, the developer actually HID the checkpoints starting with level 3. So assuming you're lucky enough to play through three sublevels without getting a tank spawned directly in front of a walker while a helicopter lands waves of troops in front of an explosive barrel, and you're lucky enough to get the grenade launcher required to beat the boss, you can have fun trying to conjure that perfect storm all over again when you don't perform the unintuitive task necessary to find the only checkpoint of level 3. Garbage design, garbage implementation, garbage game. Avoid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105344474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1451243359}
review: I am not a platformer game fan and the only game of this kind that i feel good was metal slug. This game is nothing like metal slug. It is too messy to dodge bullets and the graphic makes it very dull. The 1st boss was so easy I did not notice any attack from the boss although it take a while to take it down.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971137545', 'num_games_owned': 2691, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1509076680}
review:
Petit jeu de shoot avec graphismes retro en pixels.
Des armes à ramasser comme le lance flamme, les grenades, le double gun et la poule par exemple.
Petit bémol car on ne peut pas changer d'arme ou choisir celle que l'on veut. La durée de vie de l'arme est limitée et disparait à la fin de ce temps ou dès que vous en ramasser une autre.
Des personnages à débloquer au fil des niveaux. Quelques mini-jeux comme une course contre le scrolling sur un train ou un genre de donkey kong ou il faut éviter les barilles explosifs tout en avançant (et non en montant comme dans donkey kong).
Impossible de sélectionner le niveau de départ lorsqu'on veut démarrer une nouvelle partie, je trouve ça dommage.
Jeu assez vite lassant au bout de quelques minutes de jeu.
Vous devez absolument faire attention à vos munitions car une fois épuisées, c'est la mort qui vous attends car il est quasiment impossible d'en looter sans tuer des énemies ou sans casser des caisses (vous pouvez avoir la chance d'en trouver dans les maisons à visiter cependant).

author: {'steamid': '76561198012610299', 'num_games_owned': 1156, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1455133402}

author: {'steamid': '76561198106610293', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1448929485}
review:
La verdad es que es un juego muy divertido, es una especie de "metal slug" pero con un notas con tupé. Tiene unos gráficos excelentes si lo comparas con juegos de su misma escala (8 bits) y buen sónido, aunque la cancioncita se hace algo repetitiva si te llevas mucho tiempo jugando de seguido. Lo mejor de todo, sin duda, es el frenetismo que proporciona el juego y los controles que son fáciles e intuitivos. En unos segundos estarás pegando tiros, si es que te lo compras claro jaja.

Definiivamente recomiendo el juego. 

Puntuación: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198063489127', 'num_games_owned': 2158, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1447593626}
review:
Ein Plattform-Shooter im Pixel-Look ohne nennenswerte Story, der zu Beginn Laune macht. Da man aber nach dem Tod wieder von vorne startet, wird es nach mehreren Durchgängen ermüdend, da die jeweiligen Level eine immer gleiche Szenerie haben.
Es gibt außerdem eine mittelmäßige Anzahl an spielbaren Waffen und Charakteren.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032632811', 'num_games_owned': 888, 'num_reviews': 758, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1447264860}
review:
A 2D platformer involving guns, guns and more guns that is procedurally generated giving it a "be ready for anything" attitude.

At first the game appears to consist of a mindless walking forward, jump ‘n’ shootin’, and picking up weapons/ammo, you’re having a grand old time. But then you realize that doing kills you real fast later on and fun’s over, if you want to get further, that is.

Graphically it's simple, but when ammo and bullets start flying you'll start to wonder what is friend, foe, or empty cartridges falling off the screen.

The music is fine, nothing to really talk about. It's chiptune in an 8-bit inspired game. GG.

Pretty sure this game is a mobile game that was just ported to steam for some reason. It's not bad but it feels unnecessarily out of your control. It's hard to make any sort of progress without being smited after making what you thought was a small risk or wasn't even much of a threat. You can get lucky with finding and having enough money to buy some of the slightly helpful powerups but have any sense of security ripped away from you almost immediately, leaving you naked and exposed to the cruel forces of RNG.

This is also one of those games that frontloads you with achievements, pushing you to continue to play. However, it uses the mobile game formula of “even if you did achieve it, you don't unlock until you do it again while the achievement is set to an active one” (that was a mouth-full, oops). But what if I've done the achievement several times and the only reason the current ones aren't getting down is because they are based on random encounters? I know this won’t be an issue for everyone but personally, as someone who’s a bit cuckoo for achievements and occasionally likes to 100% games, this is just rude.

Like what you see? Maybe, just maybe, consider getting it on mobile device where you can play it on and off because you certainly won't find enough gameplay here to keep you going for too long.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053924905', 'num_games_owned': 3909, 'num_reviews': 374, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1446619135}

author: {'steamid': '76561198076098994', 'num_games_owned': 256, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4, 'last_played': 1447096514}
review:
Es un juego arcade de acción y scroll lateral que intenta parecerse a juegos como Bro Force, pero es muy aburrido. Lo unico que tienes que hacer (que es lo que yo he hecho durante 5 niveles, incluyendo boses) es darle al boton de avanzar y al de disparar para pasarte los niveles, nada de esquivar balas, ataque, etc. 

ABURRIDO

Aparte de todo esto, cabe mencionar que aunque entienda que es un juego indie, no se han esmerado mucho en hacer los graficos y bonito artisticamente. Todo ello sin poner un menu en el juego para poder cambiar la resolucion, controles y ese tipo de cosas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130262111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 261, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1452056858}

author: {'steamid': '76561198127803429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1446690373}
review: To qualify this review I do need to tell you what types of games I'm typically used to. More along the lines of first person shooters with at least decent graphics.I haven't played something quite this pixelated since the 80s.  As a matter of fact I honestly think that they took some ideas from Donkey Kong, Super Mario Bros, and I'm not even certain what else.  But, that having been said, I think they definitely has some potential here. I like the concept they used with incorporating other familliar games into this retro game. I don't think I could play it very long; however. It is something that could be fun to kill a very short period of time.

Se você é saudosista, tem orgulho e saudade dos jogos que tínhamos acesso na infância, Gunslugs vale muito a pena para você. Jogabilidade flui muito bem, a trilha sonora é boa e assim como Metal Slug, muita coisa acontece na tela ao mesmo tempo, isso torna o jogo mais desafiador, o que é ótimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028821337', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1446665149}
review:
Дякую за картки 3/6 і хороша ностальгічною музика, не очікував. Але одноманітність, постійна стрілянина, напруга не залишає тебе. Незручно коли відкриваєш Steam в грі і там дозвіл йде 800х600.

Спасибо за карточки 3/6 и хорошая ностальгической музыка, не ожидал. Но однообразие, постоянная стрельба, напряжение не оставляет тебя. Неудобно когда открываешь Steam в игре и там разрешение идёт 800х600.

Thanks for card 3/6 and good nostalgic music, I didn't expect. But the monotony of constant shooting, the tension leaves you. Uncomfortable when you open Steam in the game and there resolution is 800x600.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069495293', 'num_games_owned': 456, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1446937591}
review:
Un juego entretenido para pasar un rato, que puede llegar a enganchar un poco. Si te gustan los plataformas 2D de disparos es un buen juego.
Me gustaría un modo por pantallas, en vez de tener que empezar cada vez desde el principio si mueres, donde el único objetivo son las misiones que puedes ir completando.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212715028', 'num_games_owned': 327, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1447963209}
review:
Its a very nice game, worth some time-wasting.
In this rogue-like game, you have to defeat the "Black Duck army" by destroying beacons in randomly generated levels and kill their army.

The gameplay might not be unique (see for example Expendabros), but even with the pixel graphics the game looks very decent.
The music and the sounds fit to the 8-bit style of the game.
The controls are a bit... "unique" and not customizable unfortunately, but you get used to it.

All in all, this is a very nice game worth its 5 dollars. Great work!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042225625', 'num_games_owned': 6556, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1497102919}
review:
It's a low-budget super-big-pixel clone of 'Expendabros' (there's even a character named Sly in red bandana) MINUS the magnificent destructible landscape, you only break crates here. You also get some caged hostages free and fight gigantic mechanized bosses. One lonely track for background music, sprites are hard to destinguish at times.. Other than that it may provide some shooting fun, it's not that bad.

Низкобюджетная, зато крупнопиксельная пародия на "Расходных братьев" (есть даже герой Слай в красной бандане) МИНУС великолепные разрушаемые ландшафты, тут ломаются только ящики. Также необходимо освобождать заложников из клеток, подбирать новые пушки и бороться с гигантскими машинами-боссами. Один-единственный трек в качестве фоновой музыки, порою трудновато различать спрайты... Помимо всего этого игра может доставить удовольствие от стрельбы, не так уж плоха.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043853545', 'num_games_owned': 1496, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1598640784}
review:
Gun Slugs 게임

Pixel 으로 만든게임이라 그런지....

그래픽은 적지만....

게임은 재미있다...

메탈슬러그 같은 연사게임...

체력 하고 탄약이 있는데...

체력은 적군에게 총 맞으면 체력이 달지만...

폭탄이나 로봇한테 맞으면 게임오버...


액션이라그런지 중독성 있다...

나의 평가는 추천....이다.

review:
Pra quem gosta de Plataforma e Pixel, esse jogo é pra você. Frenético e simples, com uma pitada de humor característico, nostalgico e sem segredo: matar ou morrer. Quem tiver alguém pra jogar multiplayer, é melhor ainda! :'D
Espere uma promoção, e compre sem medo!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084385268', 'num_games_owned': 4156, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1446371768}
review:
Review i gave the game from Orlygift - 

Its very addicting. Nice blend of 4th wall with the extra characters in bonus dungeons. Was only going to play to review it but i may try to finish the game.  There are lots of improvements to be done though
Need to have options menu for jump to space bar. died too many times..
Coins disappear too quickly. If you intend to kill an enemy near the other end. you wont be able to get it back..
The text hurts my eyes...need an option to have clear text

author: {'steamid': '76561197979863163', 'num_games_owned': 5924, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1446348514}
review:
Fun gameplay, good controls, awesome music!
Gunslugs really nails that oldschool arcadey feeling, which isn't that easy to achieve.
The random level generation adds replayability, but isn't perfect.
Sometimes landmines will pop-up in places that are impossible to avoid.
It also may be a bit too difficult for some players (me), 
but may be great for those who like a good challenge.
As the positives massively outweigh the negatives, this is a definitive "Thumbs up" for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023077730', 'num_games_owned': 4238, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1443585573}
review:
Чрезвычайно скучная игра.

Беготня по одним и тем же уровням снова и снова... Низкое качество графики, её тотальное однообразие, унылый геймплей(линейно бежать в правую сторону экрана и убивать всё что движется). В каком-нибудь "Бро форсе" это было интересно делать, тут же нет и четверти фана, что получаешь там. В общем, эта игра совершенно ничем не может заинтересовать игрока. 

2\10

author: {'steamid': '76561198041967011', 'num_games_owned': 662, 'num_reviews': 536, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1443350904}
review:
Это дешевая и ленивая мини-версия Broforce. Меню настроек нет, а разрешение экрана маленькое - глаза болят и устают. Пару звуков, пару элементов окружения - вот и всё разнообразие. Нет ни системы сохранений, ни разных режимов игры. Один раз нажимаете кнопку Esx = выходите в меню паузы; второй нажимаете = выкидываетесь из игры. Сохранений, повторюсь, нет. Пули нарисованы в виде серой полосочки, обведённой белым контуром. Ну, это логично, потому что задний фон первого уровня тёмно синий, передний фон и земля тёмно серые, а постройки и декорации бело-светло серые, так что не ждите красочности или насыщенности картинки.

Выглядит дёшево и бедно. Таких игр полно на бесплатных онлайн сайтах, том же Armor Games. Хотя нет, на том сайте продукт более качественный... Лучше потратьте время на поиск аркады в гугле, есть высокая вероятность, что найденное вами будет в разы лучше это платной фигни.
